reviews.text:
Interesting museum of Islamic art.
On the ground floor they had a very beautiful exposition about Syria and its history of Aleppo's city.
The other two floors were less interesting but for the fair price you pay it is really worth a visit!
The museum is very clean, I would recommend a visit on a stop over in Doha.

The museum is modern, very airy and open inside and has a wow factor. Exposition on Syria was very good, with masterful deployment of video throughout. Very informative. The museum itself is not very rich in exhibits (that's putting it gently) but may be worth a visit if you have a couple of hours to spare.
Amazing architecture. Awesome view. Too much cold inside. Good for history enthusiasts. Make sure you carry a valid RP with you. Entry is free.

Great place. Had many historical artifacts of Islamic History and culture. Perfect arrangement. Like it. architectural designs of the museum are so nice. Best place for expats to learn about Islamic history.

The Museum of Islamic Art is one of the star attractions of Doha. The building is modern in its construction and quite grand. The spacious entrance hall has a viewing window and couches that offer a panoramic view of the Doha skyline. On the upper floors are the exhibits, neatly segregated geographically. Arts and artefacts from various Islamic civilizations of Arabia, Egypt, Persia, India, Turkey, Syria and Africa are exhibited with a lot of descriptive information. Surely worth a visit when at Doha.

Amazing use of film projection on the walls, creates a larger than life experience. Exhibits are clearly displayed to give a 360° view of artifacts. Children are well catered for with each gallery having it's own interactive display for children to enjoy.
Very impressive and well worth a visit.

You're getting a very warm welcome and staff is very friendly. Love the giant Projected Screens covering most of the walls & very informative too.Kids love the games through which they can learn a lot about different subjects. A must watch if you are here in Doha.

amazing🇶🇦💕💕Wonderful and Unique. The architecture and interior displays are astounding. Staff are very helpful to visitors and are obviously very proud to showcase the prehistory of Qatar right to the present day. Wonderful experience.
Amazing. A true insight into the history of Qatar. It really puts into perspective all the nation has been able to achieve and how far it has come. Beautiful architecture.
Very beautiful and amazing museum. It's one of the best thing in qatar. Busy at evening. It's a next generation museum. No prohibition for photo taking. Good and helpful teams to support visitors.
This museum is no longer open, and has either been permanently closed or relocated as of  01/01/19.

Interesting museum of Islamic art.
On the ground floor they had a very beautiful exposition about Syria and its history of Aleppo's city.
The other two floors were less interesting but for the fair price you pay it is really worth a visit!
The museum is very clean, I would recommend a visit on a stop over in Doha.

The museum is modern, very airy and open inside and has a wow factor. Exposition on Syria was very good, with masterful deployment of video throughout. Very informative. The museum itself is not very rich in exhibits (that's putting it gently) but may be worth a visit if you have a couple of hours to spare.
Amazing architecture. Awesome view. Too much cold inside. Good for history enthusiasts. Make sure you carry a valid RP with you. Entry is free.

Great place. Had many historical artifacts of Islamic History and culture. Perfect arrangement. Like it. architectural designs of the museum are so nice. Best place for expats to learn about Islamic history.

The Museum of Islamic Art is one of the star attractions of Doha. The building is modern in its construction and quite grand. The spacious entrance hall has a viewing window and couches that offer a panoramic view of the Doha skyline. On the upper floors are the exhibits, neatly segregated geographically. Arts and artefacts from various Islamic civilizations of Arabia, Egypt, Persia, India, Turkey, Syria and Africa are exhibited with a lot of descriptive information. Surely worth a visit when at Doha.
متحف الطوابع مكان رائع
It’s was not a good experience we couldn’t enter by the wheelchair even in there site wrote wheelchair accessible. The place is empty. Needs more work and attraction.

This is located very close to Souq Waqif. The don't allow people inside. All you can do is to take a photograph from the outside. Maybe if you are a good photographer, you can click a nice photograph against the night sky.

Is an old jail from the year 1880th  and now is closed and rarely open I visited . One day i had the chance to get in it's was an amazing moment and how they preserved it . I am sorry that nobody can't see that such piece of Qatar historical place.
Interesting and enjoyable to spend all day there just walking around
Good taste. Good stuff behavior... Just a little bit expensive
Perfect. Historical.

Balıkesir Saat Kulesi - Balıkesir

Saat Kulesi 1829 yılında Girit’li Mehmet Paşa tarafından İstanbul Galata Kulesi’nin benzeri olarak silindir şeklinde yaptırılmış idi. 1897 yılındaki deprem nedeniyle yıkılınca, 1901 yılında bugünkü şekliyle yeniden yaptırılmıştır. Kare prizma şeklindeki bina, beyaz kesme taş ile yapılmış ve kabartma işçiliklerle de süslü hale getirilmiştir.En üst kat kubbe ile örtülmüş ve büyük bir çan eklenmiştir. Buranın hemen altındaki katta ise dört yöne de birer saat konmuştur.

Bu kadar değerli bir eserin bu kadar biçimsiz bir noktada kalması kötü olmuş. Kuleyi yapanlar ileriyi görememişler. Kilise çanı benzeri her saat başı çalması müslüman mahallesinde salyangoza benziyor bu ses değişmeli
Şehire ayrı bir hava katan mimari yapı. Ne zaman çan başlasa içimden pink floyd high hopes mırıldanmama sebep oluyor..o nedenle ayrı seviyorum.
Kültürel mirasımızın emanet ettiği güzel yapılardan birisi

One of the best location for tourists in Doha. The traditional architecture of Souq Waqif is beautiful.  The Souq has numerous shops selling garments, spices, handicrafts. A special mention to its pets area which has a variety of pet stalls. The Souq is famous for its restaurants and cafes. The ambience at Souq Waqif is simply impeccable. IT'S A MUST VISIT PLACE IN QATAR.
Souq Waqif is a market recreated as traditional Arab markets. Awesome place. A must visit place if you are a Tourist in Qatar
Great atmosphere. Arabic Cultural things. Arabic Tea. Arabic food. Good place for a outing with friends. Better to go in the evening
Entertaining Environment, full of Cultural heritage and Art work, with Currency exchange at ease. Great place to be and highly recommended for travelers going to Qatar.

This is definitely one of the favorites in Qatar.
Wide range of shops, old Arabian market feel. Used to be Irani market, still most shops and businesses are Iranian. But a cool place to hang. Wide range of restaurants. Loved every minute there.

If you have never been to Qatar and want to learn about its actual past livelihood and developments, then you need to visit this place.
This place provides great information about the past few decades and visual of aerial images of how the place looked liked before and how it transformed to what we see today. It also exhibits miniature structural designs of previous and future plans.
This centre is innovative of itself, it is built on to a decommissioned barge which they turned into a magnificent place to visit near downtown Doha.

Super polite staff. Free entrance and they offer you a free mixture of tea and coffe. But the exhibition is not more than what any big architect company would put on to show off their work, plans and models. Sorry.
It provides an insight into old Doha/Qatar and the development that ensued. I  just felt that I wanted more.
All about building structures. So if you have passion on buildings. You must visit this place.
There's nothing much to see inside but the miniature is very nice

Probably one of the best libraries that I have ever come across! Alhamdulillah..
So many books to choose from, in multiple languages, covering every possible topic in the world. Even the children's library section has a huge array of books.
The most exciting for me was the Innovation Section - a series of rooms dedicated to various kinds of technology that you can use as a member.

It even houses a fully-fledged restaurant offering fresh meals at all times during working hours.

Amazing place.!! The kiosk for borrowing books is very innovative. Great ambiance and well structured.Lot of facilities available like computers, private and group study rooms etc.Really got inspired to make reading my regular habit.

Amazing design.

This building is really amazing architecture of the building is great, from inside it's full of natural light. Book collection is good you can borrow 3 book in one time for 22 days. Membership is easy just show your QID.

Qatar National Library is indeed an amazing place. You spend your whole day inside the library. Everything you need is alreasy provided for you; there is cafteria to order your lunch and dinner, there is coffee shop to get hot teas and coffees when needed, event halls are there to attend any event suit your interest, there is gaming to engage in during your leisure time. Lastly, very unique thing about the library is that you are allowed to bring your kids; there is play area for them.

nice huge library however it is hard to get to and there are not many signs. I found the parking way in the back. Google maps will take you to the front, however if you take left on first round about before you reach destination pass the next round about there will be parking on your right. But you have to walk back to the library maybe a one block or 500 meters back. The library is the white building, all surrounding buildings are universities etc.

Havelli heritage is a good restaurant with good ambience.

Little costly compared to other restaurants in Barwa village.
Nice food at affordable rates

A good quality food. Price a bit high but it didn pinch because of good taste. Tandoori n lahsooni chicken I have tried... a different great taste after a long gap for me.... roti items like naan i found a bit small... so equally you need to increase in quantity.

Time to update the ratings. This one is definitely a surprise for me because the last time I was here it was not such a memorable experience.

Awesome and good :
  Being vegetarian, though my options are limited to the biryanis, kadais and gravy items, they were not disappointing. Infact, the curd rice with its 'tadka' is the best in Doha. Even on their bad days, the curd rice still tops the best from their competitors.

And, make sure you try their samosas. Hot, fresh and delicious. The chutneys are simply awesome. 

Avg. and Bad:
   Thali option is decent. But at times a little oily. 
   I did not like that the food sometimes is not consistent in taste. They fluctuate from awesome to Avg sometimes.

Owing to recent experiences, I decided to re-review and that too positively. It is worth it.
Food is good and also the ambience at first floor.
Best
Best park for biking, if you don’t have a bike don’t worry you can rent one in this park ask the security men they are everywhere.
Good Greenery, corniche nearby
Awesome, although please start the coffee shop

This place is very good for doing exercise. And they provided everywhere exercise stations. There is different roads for cycling, walking and running. The synthetic track  for running is very good. Also there are rest rooms in several place inside the park. The  red color road they made is looking fantastic. Also flyover is there for crossing main road. Kids play ground and family get-together area also there.
Huge park, have jogging track, kids area is excellent, BBQ designated places, underground parking and greenery everywhere..

Beautiful gardens, game zone for children, food bus, sea and high quality sea facing cafes all you can find at one place which MIA park. Beautiful locations for photography, decent atmosphere for family picnic and peaceful and relaxing place for solo travellers.

It's very nice, and made beautiful and good ambience...but I saw some people smoking not even showing the courtsey that there are non smokers, kids and women... Authority should take measures not to smoke inside the park.

Very beautifull Park with two playgrounds 
It's a good place for Picnic, running and to enjoy a sunny day.
The only bad things is the bathroom looks small specially the weekend too mush people comes there.
One of my favorite parks to visit, in Doha. Well maintained, lush greenery and has 2 cafes at the end of the park, overlooking the water and with a great view of the Doha Skyline.
Nice park have food court, 3 sides cover with sea 🌊 more greenery

A very basic restaurant offering basic 'American' diner menu options. Prices are quite high for the quality of food received, but if you are into 'American' food portions, and not so much fussed about food quality and taste preferences, then this might be your restaurant of choice. A popular location for US expats working in Doha.

Been here for the first time, has a pretty American feel to it, the interiors. Good spread, servings are 'American size' so order carefully. Well priced, decent staff. All in all good place and worth it.
American style diner. Would recommend a visit. A bit out dated inside but menu is good and the food is not bad either, miss their homemade hash browns though.

Newly decorated and very bright. Food was good as ever but no Turkey Bacon or Turkey Ham this morning 😫. Definitely less choice on the menu than and the place has lost some of it's friendliness and character which is a shame.

It's been years since I last visited. Was surprised when I open the door the space is new!! Was told that they undergo renovation last ramadan. I ordered the farmers breakfast and still consistent since I last ordered. The newly renovated space is much spacious and bright. The place is now under new management and they now offer lunch specials for 30 riyals. Which I will try next visit. I pay total of 74 riyals for the breakfast and coffee.

Good Chinese restaurant in Doha. Sad that they have moved to a new location. I liked their food. Good service but the staff the chinese ones are a bit stiff in their communication. A bit of smile would make it more pleasant. Highly recommended.

Second time to have hotpot in Qatar but best one that I have ever tried . Rice noodles is super super tasty and most importantly, is quite authentic! I really suggest people to have a try on it ! Like the freshly-made noodles to go with MY sesame spicy sauce , yum yum .
Best Chinese hot pot in Doha so far
The best Chinese restaurant in Doha. Foods are authentic and delicious, staffs are AMAZING. Their price is also very reasonable for the portion of the food.
Nice chines eat

One of the best location for tourists in Doha. The traditional architecture of Souq Waqif is beautiful.  The Souq has numerous shops selling garments, spices, handicrafts. A special mention to its pets area which has a variety of pet stalls. The Souq is famous for its restaurants and cafes. The ambience at Souq Waqif is simply impeccable. IT'S A MUST VISIT PLACE IN QATAR.
Souq Waqif is a market recreated as traditional Arab markets. Awesome place. A must visit place if you are a Tourist in Qatar
Great atmosphere. Arabic Cultural things. Arabic Tea. Arabic food. Good place for a outing with friends. Better to go in the evening
Entertaining Environment, full of Cultural heritage and Art work, with Currency exchange at ease. Great place to be and highly recommended for travelers going to Qatar.

This is definitely one of the favorites in Qatar.
Wide range of shops, old Arabian market feel. Used to be Irani market, still most shops and businesses are Iranian. But a cool place to hang. Wide range of restaurants. Loved every minute there.

Small and nice restaurant to get good TOM YUM. price is moderate and value for money. Don’t expect parking here but parking available on airport road side. Restaurant run by Filipinos and service is good. Options are decent for both non veg and vegetarians. Though the one to meal is limited else have options. Simple pricing for chicken and send food in each category. I had TOM YUM chicken noodles, which tasted great and could get the aroma of lemon grass and ginger. The potion is plentiful and good for one, certainly value for money. Unfortunate they didn’t have my fav iced longan drink. Overall thumbs up for the service, food and value for money.

The food took a lot of time to prepare even when the restaurant was empty. It didn’t taste nearly as good as other Thai restaurants in Doha such as Khaosan. It’s the only semi decent Thai restaurant in the area, so I guess that’s a plus.

Food is nice and found them try to Thai cuisine :). Giving them 5 star!!! For the staff.  My wife accidentally left her belongings and we after we get back it was safe and returned to us. Thank you!!!
Been visiting this place for many years. The quality and portion size has remain unchanged for many years. Excellent staff with great service. And above all excellent tasting Thai food.

Listen y'all, if you want sushi that's not over priced, this is your place. My wife and I have been looking for sushi that was good since we got to Doha last year.  Been to a couple brunches and that was just not what i would call sushi.  Lots of choices AND they have table BBQ's!!! Don't pass up this place just because parking is difficult due to construction. This whole in the wall is one that my family will Uber to once a month at least. I would include pics but the rolls just didn't last long enough!

Highly highly recommended. One of the best restaurants in Qatar.
Make sure you reserve a table ahead and be there on time!
The All you can eat BBQ is a great deal and always high quality. The sushi is also one of the best in Doha at the price level.
I have been here several times for tabletop barbecue and I have always left feeling very heavy, but satisfied. I also love the different kinds of sushi rolls, and the delicious side dishes. Love it!

This is a Korean restaurant. It is located in Doha,Qatar and so you get to taste abit of Korea without even going there. Their special day is Mondays.  The menu has specialties and offers varieties. The food was amazing and the service was great. The ambiance and lighting was very nice. The sitting(the chairs and seats) were very comfortable.

This is one of the best if not the best Italian restaurants in Qatar. The menu offers a wide variety of dishes, each cooked to perfection.

The restaurant moved a couple of years ago to its current location, very close to La Cigale Hotel, with seating offered outdoors and at the right time of the year, it is divine.

The only downside is that you cannot have a little glass vino to wash down your food with.

The staff are very welcoming and surprising knowledgeable and if they have the Veal Milanese available go for it, it is off the hook! 

I recommend this place without any hesitation!

Amazing place, authentic Italian cuisine and Italian staff. Everything is fresh and, if you ask, they suggest what's best to try, from the starter up to the dessert. Gigi, the owner, and Francesco, the chef, have created the best Italian cuisine spot in Doha one could desire

Food was great and the place is really cozy! The outdoor setting is just perfect for the outdoor season of Qatar and we had a wonderful time!

The place isn't designed for kids... More of a casual dinner for friends or couples... Maybe a small corporate meeting at the indoors area.

We had a pizza (5/5), a seafood soup (5/5) and spinach garlic appetizer (4/5).

All in all I left feeling very content. The place is a must.

Beautiful authentic Italian food! Warm welcoming staff that take care of all your needs! Salmon pasta is absolutely delicious. Homely atmosphere with a beautiful garden outside,  I definitely recommend this restaurant.

As authentic as it gets in Doha ... Loved the carbonara and aglio olio and especially the tiramisu despite it not having any alcohol. Lasagna and soups and burgers also not bad. 

Great ambiance, great service and great decor. Will come back!

If you are looking for a great place with great Indian food choices, this is the best in the locality. The ambience is very good and so is the food quality. Their party hall is a cosy place suitable for 25 members.
Good food. I enjoyed buffet lunch. It was value for money.
Atmosphere is good. Rather than  taste , the name is drawing people there. Got a good reputation in the market. Food is just OK.
I am not a fan of their buffet but will definitely come back for chicken chilli, chicken lollipop, and the lemon mint drink. This place is usually packed and has a great ambience.
Good food.  Neat and clean place.  Lot of choices for vegetarians.
Very tasty food at a very reasonable price
Place to get authentic chettinadu cuisine. Staff here are friendly and helpful.  Service is quick. Great ambience.
Authentic Tamil cuisine served with authentic style spice and aroma....love-in it
Not very happy. No coffee available and chicken curry was of very poor quality.
Satisfied but Restaurant near Jaidha bridge is better than this.
It is quit and neat, the food served is very well-cooked. The waiters and chefs know a lot of information on different allergies, just in case. 10/10 would recommend.
Have no idea about there non vegetarian food..but veg. food is pathetic..Not recommended for vegiee.
Were tasty food. One of the best Indian restaurants in Qatar
Really exquisite food. Great service. A gem of an Indian Restaurant.
Delicious Indian cuisine. Highly recommended
Where the waiting staff are attentive and the food is full of flavor and spice. Would definitely recommend..
My favourite..but this time got źzzz table!!
Authentic Indian taste though very rich
Wow place. Awesome food and service. The best in Doha. Nice ambience. Good taste. Nice drinks. Courteous people.
Nice place to have Indian food with alcohol being served. Tasty food.
A good Indian restaurant with affordable price and a party hall on top..
I often visit  here. Best place for SOUTH INDIAN cusines. On weekends its too hard  find a seat.. 😕

It was good bcz of its variety of food in the given amount .
They just charged 23 qr for buffe sysytem.
So it was good to hav dinner there
It's good but cabin space for family is very conjusted. Even you can not move the chair to go and come. Price is very reasonable.location is good
Good kerala food. With lot of space. Good ambiance.
Very limited choice of food at lunchtime and had to ask specifically for vegetarian food, otherwise great. Lovely place to spend a day either at the beach or by the pool. Good menu available outside.
Nice location and ambience. Been to an exhibition and once done went to the Bar near the pool. Had couple of pints in open air. So soothing and relaxed.

A nice place to have a drink and socialise after work. The staff are great and there is a very relaxed vibe here. The food isn't brilliant but it will certainly fill a gap. Beautiful views across the bay to the city.
Good location close to the airport, more of a business hotel than a pleasure one. Facilities and decor needs updating. But clean and good service
Excellent service from the moment you enter the doors. Security staff are professional, front-desk is efficient, and the concierge knows where to find whatever you need.
Nice, cosy place. Don't go downstairs if you are a non smoker. Upstairs is smoke free.
Food filled with an amazing explosion of flavors. If you are looking for new and delicious experiences this is the place. You can also come to have a beer or a tee in very cozy Berliner environment.

Best arabic food ever! Amazing experiences, great hummus. I've never tried some tasty falafel as theirs!!  The atmosphere is cozy and relaxed, the service is a bit slow but the guys were friendly and chilled. They made the difference of that place, compared to many others. Prices are super affordable as the meal were made with lots of love and quality goods! Highly recommend for a dinner or just a nice talk with friends - cool with for small talks or big ones (groups, parties can be hosted amazingly).
I'm new in Google map , but its very good and it takes anywhere easily.
Good food quality; dishes are very good there. The service need improvement though!
I had the cheese and spinach pastry, I love their dough, and the quality. The price is very cheap aswell

Ankara Restaurant is located just in front of Al Ahli hospital (Bin Omran)
This restaurant is known for best Shawarmas for Chicken, Mutton, Beef or Mix.  Very reasonably priced. 

These guys are expert and producing mouthwatering delicious food ... That too fresh .. In addition to Shawarma, try with their mix grills and grill chicken . 

The negative side is very less parking space and limited dine-in area. It is always recommended to place a order by phone, collect it at entrance.
Love love love their grilled chicken with chili bread and garlic sauce
Food is good n fresh....👌
Cheaper and nice restaurants

Great place to come relax, have some coffee/tea and Hookah. Can get crowded when there is a football match but else you'll always get a table. Great place to come watch football matches. But if you want a table is suggest come an hour before the match.

Nice place to hangout with friends who loves the smell of shisha. The food will meet your expectation. This places offers you a perfect spot to have a long chitchat with your friends and have some good food with a reasonable cost for all the services they provide.
Nice ambiance and very good choice of menu.
I really like it ❤👌
Nice place for Hukka lovers.

The lamb chops were the best I have ever eaten.  Cooked to a perfect medium rare to medium with a fantastic char on them. Moiat and delicious. The staff was friendly and efficient.  Only reason to not give it a 5 star?  There were flies in the restaurant, unavoidable, but a one start penalty just the same.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
Very good Turkish Food. Met the chef, they are Halal and offering chicken, beef and mutton options. Service time is good, staff is courteous and prices are moderate. Overall a great experience.
We have tried their new baked chicken tray with cheese. It was a good option. The price is relatively cheap. Can't rate them 5 stars though.

Great kebabs and shish tawouk served with Turkish bread. Good assortment of dips and salads to choose from, either individually or as a combination platter. A reasonable choice of juices and cocktails is also available. Serving time us usually 20 - 30  minutes depending on the time of the day. Large seating space. Interiors are not fancy but the delicious food more than makes up for that. The bathrooms are not too clean so try and avoid them.
My brother lived in Doha and said this place makes the BEST Mediterranean food. It was super delicious!!!  And the yogurt drink Labaan was yum. Really nice people too.

Nice restaurant with good view of Old Town. Food was great, though the bottom sides of my fish fillets on the fish & chips were slightly soggy compared to the nice crispy top sides. Still good nonetheless. Also ordered the peel & eat shrimp as an appetizer. Nice big pieces of shrimp cooked perfectly. I could do with a little less of the buttery sauce that it sits in though. All in all, good food, good service - I'll be back.

So being from the Midwest we are not able to get fresh seafood usually. So when on one of the coasts, seafood is a must! Ordered the Fisherman’s platter, which had fish, shrimp and scallops with fries. All were good, but I felt the scallops were the best I’ve ever had! Not rubbery, very soft and tasty. Sad there were only two on the plate! All in all, this would have been a 5-star, except I felt the portion size was less than the price should have suggested.

Nice restaurant in Old Town. Good selection of dishes, service was friendly but nothing wowed me.  I would be happy to eat here again as I enjoyed the food but felt it could have been better executed.  I had the fish tacos and while the fish portion was very generous the other accompaniments felt a little overwhelmed.  It is a fish market so maybe it's just me?
The food was fresh and tasty. I had a big plate of mixed seafood. The crab cake and the grilled veggies was yummy. Atmosphere was nice and busy. Great selection of beers.

So disappointed with my small Captains plate for $26.00!!! I got two shrimp, one oyster, one scallop and a fish fillet.  I used to share the small platter!!! What happened???? I told the server that he should let customers know how small the portion is now!!!  The flavor was good and the rest of my party enjoyed their lobsters and Cobb salad or I would have rated it a 1.  This has always been one of our favorite places to bring out of town guests.
Expensive and limited parking space.

Highly recommended for wise shoppers. Promotional items in this place are always around the corner. From wet goods to dry goods prices are quite economical. Fresh fruits and vegetables, meats and fishes and a lot more. It is accessible to all commuters and one of the busiest shops in Doha.

A great mall with everything you want! 
You can go in here for a quick bite or you can spend here looking at their great collection in various sections. Weather it be Electronics or Clothing or Toys or Sports equipments. They have it all covered.

Huge facility catering to almost everything that one could think of....you name it and they have it....they are well stocked....which only ensures one will never ever leave the store disappointed...staff is  trained adequately...there were some instances where communication became a challenge..wares are systematically displayed...category wise so shopping becomes easy and time saving....one truely captivating section was their...ready to serve food section...the cuisine offered was astonishing...quality quantity excellent....appealing to the palate...well organized and ably managed facility with ample of parking spaces...very satisfying visit.....a boon to local expat population

One of the biggest Lulu Hyper market is here. Let's start with parking. You don't need to worry about the parking . Lot's of parking space available.There is a bus stop near lulu from you will get bus to doha bus terminal. products inside the mall are very good with reasonable price. Almost all products are available here.
An Ideal place for shopping. This is one of the oldest shopping centers in Qatar. Convenient ample car parking is available. Non availability of a food court is a disadvantage.

You'd be surprised to think it's the end of the world when shopping in this place!

The shelves literally have nothing on them, when they do you might want to grab it then and there as you may never see it again with the stock changing almost every day, some of the things you want you will never find, the prices are crazy for just the basics (Like £7 for a box of cereal!!) and it's literally a ghost town almost every day when you walk in it as parts of the shop look abandoned or just plain empty.

I would recommend the local shop just south from this one on the marina, has more in it and the prices are much more reasonable. 

This one is just way too overpriced for what its meant to be. Do not recommend!
It's permanently closed. Everyone says it went out of business last year. I believe there are no Spinney's at the Pearl anymore.
Really lovely place. A nice selection of shops and ample parking space.
Easy parking but you cannot find always your needs
Great location but its like a ghost town with no stock!
Very limited choice of food at lunchtime and had to ask specifically for vegetarian food, otherwise great. Lovely place to spend a day either at the beach or by the pool. Good menu available outside.
Nice location and ambience. Been to an exhibition and once done went to the Bar near the pool. Had couple of pints in open air. So soothing and relaxed.

A nice place to have a drink and socialise after work. The staff are great and there is a very relaxed vibe here. The food isn't brilliant but it will certainly fill a gap. Beautiful views across the bay to the city.
Good location close to the airport, more of a business hotel than a pleasure one. Facilities and decor needs updating. But clean and good service
Excellent service from the moment you enter the doors. Security staff are professional, front-desk is efficient, and the concierge knows where to find whatever you need.
